data.prayer: Spirit, inspire Bible translators to communicate the Scriptures accurately in the heart languages spoken in Évora, Portugal.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Évora, Portugal
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 173,400 people living in Évora.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 28 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 6,102 believers in the state of Évora.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Évora an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Turk people might believe through him.
Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Évora, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 173,400 souls in Évora and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Father, help 34 new simple churches start among the 173,400 people in the state of Évora, Portugal. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.
